body:
I first attempted to land https://github.com/alexcrichton/rust/commit/e3dac1e103f8b604e0cdd9217b107b9fb30404c4, but that commit segfaulted instantly with this backtrace:

```
$ gdb --args ./x86_64-unknown-linux-gnu/stage1/bin/rustc src/libcore/lib.rs

and "show warranty" for details.
```
